QT-10-2021-0720 

2^n  ~=1000

2^10 = 1024
host bit =10
network bit = 32-14= 22

cidr ip => 192.168.0.0/22
overall => 11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000

each subnet = 250
host bit = 8
network bit = 32-8= 24

overall => 11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000
subnet =>  11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000
	  ------------------------------------
	   11111111.11111111.111111xx.00000000 
           11000000.10101000.00000000.00000000 => 192.168.0.0/24
           11000000.10101000.00000001.00000000 => 192.168.1.0/24                    
	   11000000.10101000.00000010.00000000 => 192.168.2.0/24
	   11000000.10101000.00000011.00000000 => 192.168.3.0/24
2^n~=400
2^9 = 512
n= host bit = 9
network bit = 32-9 = 23
cidr ip = 192.168.0.0/23
overall = 11111111.11111111.11111110.00000000
each subnet = 200
2^n ~= 200
2^8 = 256
n= host bit = 8
network bit = 32-8 = 24
cidr ip = 192.168.0.0/24
network = 11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000

overall = 11111111.11111111.11111110.00000000
network = 11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000
	--------------------------------------
          11111111.11111111.1111111x.00000000
s1        11000000.10101000.00000000.00000000  => 192.168.0.0/24
s2        11000000.10101000.00000001.00000000  => 192.168.1.0/24
